achievements.title: AICamp Generative AI Hackathon for AI Agent and RAG
achievements.description: Won the AWS for Startups prize for creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks on behalf of users.

achievements.title: Improved Data Processing and Scalability at NREL
achievements.description: Refined data processing and optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements and comprehensive automated testing, enhancing performance and troubleshooting model build pipeline failures.

achievements.title: Implemented Financial Fintech Solutions at Oracle
achievements.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT, and production environments for two international banking firms, enhancing the processing of over 300k customer records.

achievements.title: Designed ARM Cortex-M3 Sensor Software
achievements.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures and optimized real-time data handling via RPC transfer protocols.

achievements.title: Modeled Rough Set Theory Concepts using Python
achievements.description: Successfully modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for sensor data mining, achieving a 95% accuracy in processing large datasets using Python.

achievements.title: Full-stack Development of Microservices and Web Applications
achievements.description: Engineered a distributed system for converting video files to MP3 format using microservices architecture and developed a full-stack task manager web app integrated with cloud services.
